audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - streamlining bureaucratic tasks for operational efficiency. Pattern is replicable across organizations with similar administrative processes.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (AXA) but claims are vague. 'Significantly streamlined' and 'increased operational efficiency' lack specific metrics or detailed process descriptions.
audited_claims.notes: Good strategic fit but needs quantification of efficiency gains or specific process examples

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimizes existing HR function through AI-powered skills platform. Clear workforce augmentation pattern replicable in other large organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (AXA Switzerland), specific engagement metric (35,000 employees), and clear outcomes (job satisfaction, reduced attrition). Credible and traceable.

apqc_functions.name: Manage employee onboarding, training, and development

audited_claims.notes: Strong case with specific metrics and clear business outcomes

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of existing actuarial/underwriting function. Predictive accuracy improvement directly optimizes policy pricing - core insurance capability.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (AXA Japan), specific quantified improvement (40% to 78% accuracy), clear business impact (optimized pricing). Authoritative and measurable.
audited_claims.notes: Excellent example of AI optimizing core insurance function with clear metrics

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes workforce augmentation and task optimization - clear Tier 1 pattern. Replicable across service organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization but vague claims. 'Freed up employees' and 'focus more on customer engagement' lack specific metrics or process details.

apqc_functions.name: Plan and manage customer service contacts

audited_claims.notes: Good concept but needs quantification - how many FTEs freed up, what specific tasks automated

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear IT infrastructure optimization. Dramatic efficiency improvement in existing server provisioning process - highly replicable pattern.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific, quantified improvement (months to 1 hour). While organization context is AXA, the metric is precise and the source appears credible.
audited_claims.notes: Dramatic efficiency gain with clear quantification - strong Tier 1 case

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimizes existing development operations by freeing developers from maintenance for innovation. Clear workforce augmentation pattern.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization context, specific outcome (adoption of CI/CD), clear process improvement described. Credible operational improvement.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Good example of technology migration enabling workforce optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear IT operations optimization - database migration efficiency with zero business disruption. Replicable pattern for similar migrations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific timeframe (weekend), clear outcome (no business disruption), credible operational achievement within AXA context.
audited_claims.notes: Strong operational efficiency case with clear risk mitigation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes project management optimization through data centralization. Replicable pattern but somewhat generic.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: While within AXA context, claim is vague. 'Better coordination and oversight' lacks specific metrics or detailed process improvements.
audited_claims.notes: Good concept but needs more specific evidence of improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear resource planning optimization - improved visibility enabling better allocation. Replicable pattern across organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Generic claim within AXA context. 'More effective allocation' lacks quantification or specific examples of improvement.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage human resources planning, policies, and strategies

audited_claims.notes: Sound strategic fit but needs metrics on allocation effectiveness

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Reporting process optimization - generating transparent reports for better decision-making. Replicable pattern.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Generic claim. 'Enhanced decision-making processes' is vague without specific examples of decisions improved or time savings achieved.
audited_claims.notes: Good concept but lacks specific evidence of reporting improvements

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing business functions rather than business model transformation or new revenue streams.
